WorkItem.ClosedComment:
As part of our move to GitHub, we're closing our CodePlex suggestions and asking that people move them to the GitHub issue tracker for further discussion.  Some feature requests may already be active on GitHub, so please make sure to look for an existing issue before filing a new one.

You can find our GitHub issue tracker here:
https://github.com/microsoft/typeScript/issues
WorkItem.Description:
Here's one for the "post-1.0 polish" bin.

The C# editor has beautiful IntelliSense support for filtering for both exact matches and camelCase/PascalCase matches by first letter in each word. So I can type "DT" and get back "DateTime".

Please implement this as soon as possible in the TypeScript editor; it's super-helpful for larger codebases.

Thanks for getting TypeScript to the point where it is today! :)

Comments.Message: Thanks for the suggestion assigning to Jon who handles our suggestions.
